text: Avoid the Lenovo Legion Y7000 (81LD0006US) 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 128 GB PCIe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The screen developed dead pixels within a month.. Looking to return it.

The Lenovo Legion Y7000 (81LD0006US) 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 128 GB PCIe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for gaming, but the speakers could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Had several issues with the Lenovo Legion Y7000 (81LD0006US) 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 128 GB PCIe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop since day one. overheats and the keyboard feels cheap. Performance in gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Avoid the Lenovo Legion Y7000 (81LD0006US) 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 128 GB PCIe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The screen developed dead pixels within a month.. Looking to return it.

Avoid the Lenovo Legion Y7000 (81LD0006US) 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 128 GB PCIe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The chassis feels surprisingly flimsy for the price.. Looking to return it.
